t.INT_ID t_INT_ID, t.NAME t_NAME, t.LONGITUDE t_LONGITUDE, t.LATITUDE t_LATITUDE, t.IS_TUNEL t_IS_TUNEL, t.IS_RRU t_IS_RRU, t.BTS_NAME t_BTS_NAME, t.BSC_NAME t_BSC_NAME, t.BTS_ID t_BTS_ID, t.CIRCUITROOM_OWNERSHIP t_CIRCUITROOM_OWNERSHIP, t.TRANS_OWNERSHIP t_TRANS_OWNERSHIP, t.VENDOR_BTSTYPE t_VENDOR_BTSTYPE, t.CITY_ID t_CITY_ID, t.COUNTY_ID t_COUNTY_ID, t.RELATED_BTS t_RELATED_BTS, t.MANUAL_FLAG t_MANUAL_FLAG, t.DELETE_FLAG t_DELETE_FLAG, t.DELETETIME t_DELETETIME, t.UPDATETIME t_UPDATETIME, t.SERVICE_LEVEL t_SERVICE_LEVEL, t.DELETE_RESONCODE t_DELETE_RESONCODE, t.DELETE_TEXT t_DELETE_TEXT, t.HIGHTRAIN_FLAG t_HIGHTRAIN_FLAG, t.REDLINE_FLAG t_REDLINE_FLAG
mapper.insert: insert into WY_TUNEL (INT_ID, NAME, LONGITUDE, LATITUDE, IS_TUNEL, IS_RRU, BTS_NAME, BSC_NAME, BTS_ID, CIRCUITROOM_OWNERSHIP, TRANS_OWNERSHIP, VENDOR_BTSTYPE, CITY_ID, COUNTY_ID, RELATED_BTS, MANUAL_FLAG, DELETE_FLAG, DELETETIME, UPDATETIME, SERVICE_LEVEL, DELETE_RESONCODE, DELETE_TEXT, HIGHTRAIN_FLAG, REDLINE_FLAG ) values (#{intId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{longitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{latitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{isTunel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isRru,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{btsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bscName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{btsId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{circuitroomOwnership,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transOwnership,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vendorBtstype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{countyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{relatedBts,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{manualFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deletetime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{serviceLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleteResoncode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deleteText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hightrainFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{redlineFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )

mapper.update:
update WY_TUNEL
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LONGITUDE = #{longitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LATITUDE = #{latitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IS_TUNEL = #{isTunel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_RRU = #{isRru,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BTS_NAME = #{btsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BSC_NAME = #{bscName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BTS_ID = #{btsId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CIRCUITROOM_OWNERSHIP = #{circuitroomOwnership,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRANS_OWNERSHIP = #{transOwnership,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VENDOR_BTSTYPE = #{vendorBtstype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CITY_ID = #{cityId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
COUNTY_ID = #{countyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RELATED_BTS = #{relatedBts,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MANUAL_FLAG = #{manualFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DELETE_FLAG = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DELETETIME = #{deletetime,jdbcType=DATE},
UPDATETIME = #{updatetime,jdbcType=DATE},
SERVICE_LEVEL = #{serviceLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELETE_RESONCODE = #{deleteResoncode,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DELETE_TEXT = #{deleteText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HIGHTRAIN_FLAG = #{hightrainFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REDLINE_FLAG = #{redlineFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where INT_ID = #{intId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update WY_TUNEL set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LONGITUDE = #{longitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LATITUDE = #{latitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, IS_TUNEL = #{isTunel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_RRU = #{isRru,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BTS_NAME = #{btsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BSC_NAME = #{bscName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BTS_ID = #{btsId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CIRCUITROOM_OWNERSHIP = #{circuitroomOwnership,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRANS_OWNERSHIP = #{transOwnership,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VENDOR_BTSTYPE = #{vendorBtstype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CITY_ID = #{cityId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COUNTY_ID = #{countyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RELATED_BTS = #{relatedBts,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MANUAL_FLAG = #{manualFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DELETE_FLAG = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DELETETIME = #{deletetime,jdbcType=DATE}, UPDATETIME = #{updatetime,jdbcType=DATE}, SERVICE_LEVEL = #{serviceLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DELETE_RESONCODE = #{deleteResoncode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DELETE_TEXT = #{deleteText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HIGHTRAIN_FLAG = #{hightrainFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REDLINE_FLAG = #{redlineFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where INT_ID = #{intId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update WY_TUNEL
MANUAL_FLAG = #{manualFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DELETE_RESONCODE = #{deleteResoncode,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DELETE_TEXT = #{deleteText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
1=1
and INT_ID=#{intId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
and delete_flag=#{deleteFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
select count(1) from( SELECT
${sqlsb} ,count(1) num FROM (SELECT , e.name cityname,f.name countryname FROM wy_tunel u LEFT JOIN wy_city e ON u.city_id=e.id LEFT JOIN wy_city f ON u.county_id=f.id WHERE u.delete_flag=0 )
1=1
and city_id in(${cityIds})
GROUP BY
${sqlsb}
)

select count(1) from( SELECT
${sqlsb} ,count(1) num FROM (SELECT u.INT_ID,u.CITY_ID,u.NAME,u.BSC_NAME,u.BTSID,u.PN,u.CI,u.IS_RRU,u.IS_GF, , e.name cityname,f.name countryname,o.NAME PROP_NAME,p.NAME SHAREFLAG_NAME,q.NAME ROAD_ID_NAME FROM wy_cell u LEFT JOIN wy_tunel_manual tm ON tm.int_id=u.int_id LEFT JOIN wy_city e ON u.city_id=e.id LEFT JOIN wy_city f ON u.country_id=f.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT CODE,NAME FROM wy_cons WHERE groupcode='TUNELPROP')o ON o.code=tm.PROP LEFT JOIN (SELECT CODE,NAME FROM wy_cons WHERE groupcode='TUNEL_SHARE')p ON p.code=tm.SHAREFLAG LEFT JOIN(select ID,NAME from wy_lib_road where delete_flag=0)q ON q.ID=tm.ROAD_ID WHERE u.delete_flag=0 and u.is_indoor='隧' )
1=1
and city_id in(${cityIds})
GROUP BY
${sqlsb}
)

select city_id,count(1) num from wy_tunel
delete_flag=0
and manual_flag=#{manualFlag}
group by city_id order by city_id
